attributes.action: encourage citizens to exercise more by reducing the cost of sport and health club subscritpions through allowable income tax deductions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people do not take regular exercise because of the cost of private health club membership.  The Government could encourage exercise for all by making  membership and subscription costs deductible against income tax.  The cost/benefit of the potential long term savings to the NHS and the impact on workplace productivity should be properly assessed.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/gym-tax-relief/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
